content.text:
# 2012 Empire Trnava Cup – Singles

Anastasija Sevastova
| runner   =  Ana Savić
| score    = Walkover
| edition  =
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Yvonne Meusburger was the defending champion, but lost in the second round to Bianca Botto.
Anastasija Sevastova won the title defeating Ana Savić in the final by walkover.
Seeds
Dinah Pfizenmaier (second round)
#  Valeria Savinykh (semifinals)
#  Nastassja Burnett (semifinals)
#  Yvonne Meusburger (second round)
#  Yuliya Beygelzimer (second round)
#  Bibiane Schoofs (quarterfinals)
#  Anastasija Sevastova (champion)
#  Elitsa Kostova (quarterfinals)
}}
